title: Body found in Mexico appears to be 1 of 10 kidnapped employees of Canadian mining company, authorities say
desc: Mexican authorities said Friday that federal forces had found a body that appeared to belong to one of 10 employees of a Canadian mining company who were kidnapped three weeks ago from a city in the Mexican state of Sinaloa.
